steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(8), 1), increase(1)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(6), number_in_box(5), put_result_into_box(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(7)), then_go_to_step(2), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(4)),
Put(number_in_box(7), into_box(7)),
Put(number_in_box(5), into_box(5)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 1?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在1号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 8: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Multiply: ( number in box 6 ) * ( number in box 5 ), put result into box 1.
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 7 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Put ( number in box 7 ) into box 7
Put ( number in box 5 ) into box 5
desc_zh: 更改指令8：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
相乘：6号盒子中的数字*5号盒子中的数字，将结果放在1号盒子中。
判断：指令9中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比7号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
将7号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
将5号盒子中的数字放在5号盒子中
